content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Mr. Trabelsi, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for your interest in my apartment. The rental price that I have in mind for this apartment is €800 per month. I believe that it is a fair and competitive price based on the location and size of the apartment. What do you think about this price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euro. Can you give me the lease agreement?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Of course, Mr. Trabelsi. I can provide you with a draft lease agreement for your review. The lease agreement will outline the terms and conditions of the rental agreement, including the rental price, payment schedule, and any other important details. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the lease agreement before signing it.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 700 Euro. Can you give me the lease agreement?

I have a few questions, can you explain me the terms and conditions of the rental agreement?

I will sign the lease agreement as soon as I receive it.

Thank you for your kindness.

Best regards,

Aziz Trabelsi
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Of course, Mr. Trabelsi. I'm glad you agree to the rental price of €700 per month. I will prepare the lease agreement for you and send it to your email address as soon as possible.

Regarding your questions about the terms and conditions of the rental agreement, I will be happy to explain them to you. The rental agreement will include details such as the length of the lease, the rental price, the payment schedule, any security deposits, and any other important terms and conditions. Please let me know if you have any specific questions or concerns about the rental agreement, and I will do my best to address them.

Once you receive the lease agreement, please review it carefully and let me know if you have any questions or concerns. Once you have signed the lease agreement, you will be able to move into the apartment and start paying rent.

Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Mr. Trabelsi, and I look forward to working with you.
name: Heinrich Heine
